name: food
description: Food photography prompts covering plated dishes, cooking, and markets
prompts: a beautifully plated sushi assortment on a wooden board with wasabi and ginger
rising bread dough in a flour-dusted bowl on a rustic kitchen counter
an espresso being poured into a white ceramic cup with latte art forming
a colorful tropical fruit market stall with mangoes, papayas, and pineapples
a sizzling BBQ grill with ribs, corn, and vegetables over hot coals
a layered chocolate cake with ganache dripping down the sides
a steaming bowl of pho with fresh herbs, lime, and chopsticks
a cheese board with assorted cheeses, grapes, crackers, and honey
a stack of fluffy pancakes with maple syrup, butter, and blueberries
a wood-fired pizza fresh from the oven with melted mozzarella and basil
